subject: Doping (Sports)
Baseball
Steroids
Perjury
lead_paragraph: The judge presiding over Roger Clemens’s perjury trial questioned why the House of Representatives has not turned over an audio tape of Clemens’s 2008 deposition.
snippet: The judge presiding over Roger Clemens’s perjury trial questioned why the House of Representatives has not turned over an audio tape of Clemens’s 2008 deposition.
